text.data: Matelite: [character][0x1]... We did it... we won...[end]
Matelite: [character][0x1]! We did it![end]
Taicho: Oh... Dragonites...?[end]
Sendak: No! Do not come here yet![end]
Sendak: The spirit of Alexander is wandering![end]
Sendak: Alexander is going to revive!![end]
Matelite: Oh no!!!! L-look at that!![end]
Matelite: [character][0x1]! Retreat!![end]
Sendak: What shall we do?! Alexander is about to revive again![end]
[character][0x1]: It's okay! Leave it to me![end]
Palpaleos: [character][0x1]![end]
[character][0x1]: Palpaleos![end]
[character][0x1]: Matelite! Sendak![end]
[character][0x1]: Friends from Orelus! Everyone! Give me your power! Give me strength![end]
[character][0x1]: [character][0x1]... Please... You too...[end]
[character][0x1]: You don't like me, [character][0x1]... I make you feel awkward when I'm with you... I understand that...[end]
Matelite: What happened?![end]
[character][0x1]...[end]
[character][0x1]: But... [character][0x1]. You really are an important person to me.[end]
[character][0x1]: Without you I wouldn't be here. You taught me something important... The feeling of reaching beyond the sky... That there really is such a feeling...[end]
[character][0x1]: Just this once... Give me strength...! Like you did then![end]
Matelite: [character][0x1]! [character][0x1]![end]
Sendak: Is Alexander inside the princess!?[end]
Palpaleos: Then... have the Holy Dragons begun to fight inside her!?[end]
Palpaleos: Somebody! Somebody do something![end]
Matelite: Oh! Dragonite! Hurry and do something![end]
Dragonite: She is a strong girl... She has done very well... She will be all right now...[end]
Dragonite: Come forth, Valitora![end]
Dragonite: Leviathan![end]
Dragonite: ...Garuda.[end]
Dragonite: Jormungand, come to me![end]
Dragonite: Come, Hyperion![end]
Dragonite: The time for revival has come! Bahamut![end]
Sendak: What about Alexander!?[end]

Bahamut: It would seem that these are the last surviving Dragonites...
Alexander resides inside the girl... However, the battle has ended...
What is inside her is the anger and hatred of Alexander...
And his sadness, perhaps...[end]
Palpaleos: Then what will happen to [character][0x1]?![end]
[character][0x1]: Please don't worry... I... seem to be fine...[end]
[character][0x1]: Yes. I'm alright![end]
[character][0x1]: You see, I'm not the weak-minded princess I used to be.[end]
[character][0x1]: I am the Queen of Kahna! And a Dragnar! Having Alexander inside my mind is nothing to me.[end]
Matelite: Of course![end]

[character][0x1]: Bahamut... Bahamut, guardian dragon of Kahna...
From now on, what will...[end]
Bahamut: I have just been revived... I am unable to see into tomorrow...[end]
[character][0x1]: What should I say...[end]
Bahamut: [character][0x1]... Inside [character][0x1]'s heart you are held very dear.[end]
[character][0x1]: [character][0x1]... Thanks.[end]

Bahamut: I was once inside you. I am able to read your mind.
Your anger... and fear toward us... Your happiness... and sadness...
Listen, Dragnar. Allies of the Dragnar.
Orelus awaits. Return. Return to your world.[end]

Bahamut: However, those are her memories of you...
They are merely memories that shall someday fade away...[end]

Bahamut: [character][0x1]... The new era has come... But, new eras soon become old ones... No one can escape the flow of time...
Listen well, [character][0x1]... Look only to the future...
You live only here in the present, which continues its forward advance, unabated...[end]
Matelite: Come on, [character][0x1]. Let's go home.[end]
Matelite: ...But first...[end]
Matelite: There's something I need to say to you.[end]
Matelite: Thank you, [character][0x1].[end]
Matelite: It's been so long since I've used those words! It feels so awkward![end]
Matelite: Okay, [character][0x1]. How should we act when we return to the others?[end]
Let's laugh! Show our fighting spirit! A cool pose![end1]

[character][0x1]: Hey, [character][0x1]... Do you mind if I hold on tight?
Go ahead!! It's awkward, let go...[end1]
[character][0x1]: Already grabbed on...[end]

[character][0x1]: Dragon King Alexander! Come into my mind! I am not afraid of you! Because I have all my friends here! They will all give me strength!
Alexander!! Come![end][end]
